Articles.Content: hey I was just looking thru some old file and I found a mods folder that i had some cool mods that worked with version 0.17 but i currently do no have that version and ksp only releases the last stable release so I was wondering if some of you had the version please send me a link or if you need my email its [email protected]
They're not available. There's a thread somewhere around here collecting links to all the old free versions, but versions after KSP became paid are not legally available for download.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24858-Old-versions-of-KSP-%28some-versions-still-wanted!%29

0.17 is already too new though.
